name: The Perfect Recipe
description:
Become the fastest wizard in this short game called "The Perfect Recipe". You will face a giant monster and will have little to no time to gather all the correct ingredients to destroy it before time runs out !
A play area of 2mx2m is recommended (6.5 feet)
This is a little VR experience created during a 2 days jam by a group of 6 students.

Artists :

  • Guillaume Ferrucci
  • Leslie Auxoux
  • Morgan Thibault
